phrase: 0  The INQ transmits the transaction data request to the IP .
1  The IP checks the request of the INQ .
2  The IP answers the question of the INQ depending on the outcome of the examination , i.e. Transmission of data or rejection .

act id: error codes: missing activity = m, wrong order = w, ambiguous = a, else leave empty
The INQ transmits the transaction data request to the IP.
The IP checks the request of the INQ.
The IP answers the question of the INQ depending on the outcome of the examination, i.e. Transmission of data or rejection.
